text:
@GovMurphy We get frustrated where to take them, how to fill their days; especially for my nearly 4 year old grandson. 
However, I would rather be frustrated than be devasted if God forbid they (or my daughter orcson in law) were to contract the Covid19 virus. PLEASE be mindful
